participant_1.background:
I'm a fan of Jimmy Fallon and the Raptors but I'm not much of a cook.
i work as an extra for major motion pictures.
I like to go golfing on sunny days with my friends because it is a fun and relaxing way to get some exercise.
I'm trying to be more mindful of my reactions and to find healthier ways to cope with stress.
I love listening to country music while I ride my horse.

participant_2.background:
I am not close with my parents.
i spend a lot of time driving my kids to sports events.
I love watching romantic comedies and listening to the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
I enjoy the flexibility of my work schedule so I can spend time with my family and dog.
i work 2 jobs.

content.text: Hey there!  How is your day going?
Good so far, thanks!  How about yours?
Good!  I'm trying to be more mindful of my reactions and to find healthier ways to cope with stress.  How do you deal with stress?
I try to talk to my husband or friends about it, or I go for a walk or listen to music.  What are some things you've tried?
I've been trying to go for walks more often, but it can be hard to find the time.  I've also been trying to meditate, but I'm not very good at it yet!
I've heard that meditation can be really helpful.  I've never tried it, but I might give it a try.  It sounds like you're doing a lot of good things to try to cope with stress!
Thanks!  I'm trying to be better about it.  It's a work in progress, but I'm making progress!
That's great!  I'm glad to hear that.  It sounds like you're on the right track.
Thanks!  I appreciate that.  How is your work schedule?
It's pretty good.  I work two jobs, but I have a lot of flexibility with my hours, so I can spend time with my family and dog.
That sounds nice!  I'm glad you have a flexible schedule.
Me too!  It makes things a lot easier.
I'm sure it does!  What do you like to do for fun?
I love watching romantic comedies and listening to the Red Hot Chili Peppers.  I also enjoy playing sports with my kids.
Those all sound like fun things to do!  I love romantic comedies too.
They're the best!  What are some of your favorite movies?
I love When Harry Met Sally, Sleepless in Seattle, and You've Got Mail.
Those are all great movies!  I love When Harry Met Sally too!
It's so good!  What are some of your favorite songs by the Red Hot Chili Peppers?
I love Can't Stop, Under the Bridge, and Californication.
Those are all great songs!  I love Can't Stop too.
It's so good!
I'm glad we have similar taste in music!
Me too!  It's always nice to find someone who likes the same things you do.
Definitely!  Thanks for chatting with me!  It was nice talking to you.
You too!  It was nice talking to you too.
